verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:26
verses.text: For all the gods of the people are idols: but the Lord made the heavens.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:27
verses.text: Glory and honour are in his presence; strength and gladness are in his place.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:28
verses.text: Give unto the Lord, ye kindreds of the people, give unto the Lord glory and strength.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:29
verses.text: Give unto the Lord the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come before him: worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:30
verses.text: Fear before him, all the earth: the world also shall be stable, that it be not moved.
